ActCanada Infrastructure Bank Act
PrecisAppointment of MICHAEL JONATHAN SABIA, O.C., of Toronto, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Canada Infrastructure Bank, to hold office during pleasure for a term beginning on April 15, 2020 and ending on March 30, 2024.
